author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-6352; Access denied ("java.lang.RuntimePermission" "modifyThread") highly intermittent, but e.g. in store.RecoveryAfterBackup test
When we see a AccessControlException during shutdown in the notifyAll call, do nothing, which lets the Thread finish on its own.
